description.action: Evan, along with the other children, hides behind the dried-up fountain in the courtyard, panting with exhaustion after running from Bowser's forces. He looks around at the others, unsure of what to do next.
Isaac crouches beside Evan, his face etched with worry as he tries to catch his breath. He glances nervously towards the castle, wondering if the Koopa Troopers are still pursuing them.
Aaron hugs his knees to his chest, his eyes wide with fear. He looks to the other children, silently pleading for a plan to escape their predicament.
Aurelia sits next to Evan, her small hands trembling. She glances around the courtyard, her brow furrowed with concern, unsure of how they will manage to evade Bowser's forces any longer.
